page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content: In the morning it is all go.Dad goes to work in Edinburgh at 7.30am.Mum gets us up at 8.00am.We get our breakfast then go to school this happens from Monday to Friday.We come home from school,get our dinner then we go out to play.My dad comes in at about 5.00 pm and my mum goes to work at 4.45pm.In that little space my grandad watches us.I come in at about 8.30pm.My brother goes to bed at about 9.00pm.I get my supper.My mum comes in around 10.00pm.On Friday she comes in at 9.30pm.Our shopping day is Friday.My mum goes shopping to WestCalder.On that day we get school dinners because she is not in the house.At the weekend we usually go to our Aunties in Newarthill about 15 miles away.
